description: Manhole:  Manhole is 300 feet of the greatest action ever performed by the fantastically endowed Canadian Bert Edwards.  We intended to sell this last movie in 2 parts, but after viewing both parts separately it was obvious that this movie was too great to split up.  So we kept all the best action together just as it happened.  Every outstanding position flows hard and fast into a tortuous sequence of ramming and jamming from beginning to end.  Manhole is sure to become a party favorite; it has something for everyone and is sure to please even the most critical viewer.  The young man with Bert only weighs 110 lbs and Bert's endowment measures as big as his wrist.   You can actually see his entire body quiver as he receives Bert's rock hard throbbing member, stretching him from a boy's size to a manhole!
title: I Want More, Scene #03
